metadata.name: Enable Logging of All FTP Transactions
metadata.description:
Add or correct the following configuration options within the vsftpd configuration file, located at /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf: 
xferlog_enable=YES
xferlog_std_format=NO
log_ftp_protocol=YES
metadata.rationale:
To trace malicious activity facilitated by the FTP service, it must be configured to ensure that all commands sent to
the FTP server are logged using the verbose vsftpd log
format. The default vsftpd log file is <tt>/var/log/vsftpd.log</tt>.

manual_remediation:
Add or correct the following configuration options within the vsftpd configuration file, located at /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf: 
xferlog_enable=YES
xferlog_std_format=NO
log_ftp_protocol=YES
